pattern.description: Glob pattern of metric data files to load.

host.description: Hostname or IP address to send output to.

port.description: Port number to send output to.

convert_to.description: Output format to convert to. One of: graphite (default), influxdb

server_tag.description: Server hostname to associate with parsed metrics.

influx_db.description: Name of InfluxDB database to send metrics to. Requires 'convert_to' to be set to 'influxdb'.
